replies.body:
Hey guys,

I want to give some context around the change of first place - partially because I'm incredibly disappointed at this situation and partially because I know you must be equally frustrated at the impact this has had on the contest.

We fundamentally do not tolerate plagiarism. There are unfortunately many entries to each contest that are stolen images (or joke entries, otherwise rule-breaking, etc.). We check each of these as they come in and then check them again when they're shortlisted for the panel's consideration. For this contest for example a full 50% of entries were invalid before the judging process even started.

In this case we performed the usual checks on all the shortlisted entries and nothing flagged for us, so we proceeded as usual. Unfortunately the piece we originally awarded first place was NOT an original piece created for this contest and our checks just didn't catch it. We're very grateful that the community did spot the issue, so that we can better recognise and reward the people who *did* create amazing pieces of original art.

In this case we've rolled the placements upwards - second is now a well-deserved first, third is now second, and the two entries that were tied for fourth are now taking home third place. 

A big congratulations to our dedicated and talented artist community - and a big apologies for not catching this one in the first place. 

Achenar

Not sure if that DJ zed is original. I've seen it in so many places before. Hell there was even a custom skin made 2 years ago with the same splash. 

https://www.google.com.au/search?q=dj+zed&rlz=1C1CHBF_en-GBAU810AU810&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwjDrba8jYXfAhUbcCsKHd_PAfIQ_AUIDigB&biw=1536&bih=762#imgrc=Lpx-klEUJVwlRM: 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mFlvboR0_PQ&ab_channel=ShizzleYTB

though i maybe wrong and this guy was the original creator.

Edit: Justice served

I don't think you're allowed to submit past works anyways, it has to be a new drawing for the competition. So I think the 1st placer needs to be taken down and looked into. https://puu.sh/Cc38u/1d3f4e0840.jpg

Doesn't really matter if he is the original artist or not, the picture was clearly designed years ago and rules stated the artwork needed to be created specifically for the contest.

https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-creations/cKJZ4NFz-artcomp-sponsored-by-wacom

"Your entry must be made by you, submitted by you, and made specifically for this contest: this is about YOU showcasing YOUR artistic talents specifically for this contest."
Ligma {{champion:81}}
I've passed it on, thanks for the heads up.

GRRRRR. 

Thanks for finding this - we ran all the usual plagiarism checks but it didn't come up at all. :\ I'm following this up now.
wait wth the splash art for that is completely the same as well lol
https://www.twitch.tv/rogannnn This is Rogann23's twitch if you like his art come here and watch him in action ;)
That Swain concept is so cool, I'm glad it got the 1st place haha! Anyway congrats to All the Winners!{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
Congrats to the winners! so many spectacular entries {{sticker:sg-lux}}  that DJ zed is so awesome!
Your Illaoi is so badass - I think the first time I saw it I did a very vocal 'ooooooh' in the middle of the office!
Pentakill Illaoi ? Or even Dragonslayer ? tbh it looks like a 10/10 mix of both worlds XD
I am so down for a universe in which Pentakill perform at epic metal concerts and then on weekends hunt dragons. Gives me Brutal Legend vibes, a little. BEST IDEA.
im actually in love with that idea its amazing! so glad you like my illaoi though! I feel like her personality would really fit the pentakill skin line
whoa hey look who's third place now that we've reshuffled those results
:O!!!! its a real shame about the plagiarised artwork but thanks for the tie for third!

Dude, I actually love Brutal Legend its a pretty lit game. I can imagine the concepts that would come up in the design process. Like imagine if you could get rights from Bethsda. Illaoi ults = Fus Ro Dah xD *Queue Skyrim theme song*
god that would be so epic!

That's a shame that the work was plagiarism. Not cool. 
I'm a little sad that mine didn't win, but congrats to all the winners anyway! Amazing work guys! <3
Up the volibear
Just want to know when are the winners gonna receive their rewards? :)
Thanks for chasing this - I've just sent them through! <3
Cheers.
why is xin holding a mic when he's already got a face mic?? {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

I've noticed this in a few live performances recently - it is a thing that happens! 

I wonder if it's that the face mic is for communicating with backstage - and the hand mic is for the actual performance?

My Disco Taric.... weeeeks of effort. {{sticker:sg-janna}}

The volibear and illaoi ones were my favourite - their own universe doing their own styles.

Riots choice on who the winners are really confuse me, there are a few of the runner up art pieces that are much better than those that placed 2nd and 3rd. I reckon Rogan's art piece is well done but quiet underwhelming.
